price: Saa na εteε, nokorε sε Nyankopͻn bεbrε boniayεfoͻ no tirim pͻ bͻne no ase.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālikum wa-anna al-laha mūhinu kaydi al-kāfirīna
